content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
They have four soups that are $12 each ($13 if takeout) until 10:30 AM that are very good. Very clean, hearty portion, and VERY TASTY. I normally get multiple breakfast specials and eat for days. Totally recommend.
